Name: Love wish
About the game: Love Wish is an easy, fun, and challenging jigsaw puzzle.♪(^∇^*) Put the pieces together to restore the full picture of the girls. Collect their photos and animations and remember this wonderful moment❤ Game Features: 1. ❤ There are 12 sets of photo albums ❤ 2. ❤ There are 60 levels of game challenges ❤ 3. ❤ 75 achievements ❤ 4. ❤ Nice badges, emojis, and homepage backgrounds ❤ Press the 'T' key to quickly puzzle. If you don't feel smooth, you can press 'P' to close the animation background to save CPU resources. Thank you very much for supporting our game. If you like it, please recommend it, thank you!（づ￣3￣）づ╭❤～
